channel.title: Tos-scape help pls in charecters admin's do not work! help
channel.description:
ok in tos-scape V2 i go to charecters, and put in 3 player rights save, log in, and it dont work so pls help, me, and theres no admin file in data, help pls
thx

item.title: Tos-scape help pls in charecters admin's do not work! help

client.java
search for
5555
replace to 43594
or gui.java
or server.java

there is no 3 unless you make it. u put ur name in “admin” for owner but u put 2 at ure player rights if owner wants admin

item.source: Tos-scape help pls in charecters admin's do not work! help

item.title: Tos-scape help pls in charecters admin's do not work! help
item.dc:creator: @juggalofamilyinc juggalofamilyinc
item.description:
@juggalofamilyinc wrote:

:eek: people still havent figured this out

OK, first open up client.java (if u can’t find that, you shouldn’t even be here) CTRL+F search for admin, keep going until you see something that looks like:

//START OF MODERATOR/ADMIN LIST

or something like: (note: this will be in java context not as typed below)

player rights -> #, “Username”

you wanna change this for your staff list, remember 0 = normal, 1 = player mod, 2 = staff mod, 3 = owner, -1 = banned

Read full topic
